intro: Hebenstretia parviflora, commonly known as the small-flowered hebenstretia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its delicate, small white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows in woodland or rocky areas and prefers well-drained soil. Hebenstretia parviflora is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and modest blooms.
